text: De beste, 1986–2006 is a 2006 Greatest Hits album by Norwegian singer Sissel Kyrkjebøhttp://www.allmusic.com/album/det-beste-1986-2006-mw0000467273 released in Scandinavia.http://www.discogs.com/Sissel-De- Beste-1986-2006/release/1259997 This album contains 2 CDs and several previously unreleased songs.http://www.vg.no/rampelys/musikk/musikkanmeldelser/sissel-de- beste-1986-2006/a/141916/http://www.aftenposten.no/kultur/musikk/Forst-julen_- sa-hulen-6436788.html ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- !
